import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Pagination = (props) => { const [count, setCount] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { setCount(Math.round(props.count / props.length)) }, [props]) const pagina = (count) => { let result = []; for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) { result.push(i); } return result } return (
    {pagina(count).map((page) => { return (
